g.t: Develop your military and destroy your rivals' Town Halls to achieve supremacy.
Study the land's [Lore] to uncover secrets from the past and obtain the gods' blessings.
Find the legendary World Tree, Yggdrasil, and be the first to conquer it.
Take control of the Gates of Helheim and defend the zone against the [Valkyrie]s.
Focus on economy, develop a superior maritime trade and become the most prosperous merchant on Northgard.
Expand your [Territory], carry out achievements and amass [Fame] to reach greatness.
Develop your clan, carry out achievements and amass [Fame] to reach greatness.
Become the wisest warchief. Achieve an Epic Lore Victory by deserving the 4 Blessings and controlling the [BigSword].
Colonize the Anvil of Gods and forge Odin's legendary sword using [Iron].
Be the most famous when reaching ::date::.
Protect your weak ally from enemies at any price.
Be the first to find and kill the [ColossalBoar].
Control all [Helheim]s to block the invasion.
You can achieve any victory: Domination, Fame, Trading or Wisdom.
Raise your [Fame] to obtain the title of King.
With each new game, a different mythical place will emerge at the heart of Northgard. Harness its power to become a legend.
You have survived ::p:: years so far
Control an additional gate each year after 801.
Control an additional gate every 6 months after 801.
::p:: years remaining to protect your ally.
Your clan can't achieve this victory
This zone has not been explored yet. Send a [Scout] in first.
These Ruins have already been explored.
This Shipwreck has already been scavenged.
Forge the ::part:: of the Sword of Odin for ::count::.
See all relationships with this faction.
This faction has heard bad things about your enemy.
This faction has heard bad things about you.
Colonize the zone to become protector of Northgard and achieve victory!
Colonize the Gates of Helheim and keep it under your control to achieve victory!
Build a Forge in this zone and forge the Sword of Odin to achieve victory!
Assign your [Warchief]s to forge the Sword of Odin.
This purely cosmetic structure sends to your foes the message that you somehow find time to decorate your territory while crushing them.
You finished Conquest with this clan.
Only one unit from the selection group will respond to your order
Assigned to corresponding group with 0 to 9 on numrow
Pressing this when selecting units in any way will make them join or leave the selected group
Use minimap's Military mode by default
Render the cursor with the game engine instead of the operating system. Improves performance at the cost of response time.
Set Fame and Military popup to notifications
Show production icons in building menu
Need to confirm a building upgrade
Screen Space Ambient Occlusion, darkens the corners of the 3D scene to give better visuals at the cost of performances.
Prebuild terrain's textures and store them in a cache to improve performances at the cost of memory. Disabled in the Map Editor.
Blurs out far objects for a better mood at the cost of performances.
Plays custom effects on colored backlighted devices.
Displays cloud reflection on water at the cost of performances.
Temporal Anti-Aliasing. This option can make the game blurry on some low-end computers.
Mute sounds when losing window focus
This hotkey is already in use by ::action_name::. Do you want to overwrite it?
Are you sure you want to restore hotkeys to default?
The map is fully randomized, with no guarantee of equal resources.
Every team gets exactly the same zones and resources as their oponents.
Settle the harsh but generous land of Northgard and bring your clan to its culminating point.
A gigantic volcano emerged at the center of Northgard. Withstand the apocalyptic era of Ragnarok and battle your enemies while enduring relentless eruptions.
The land of Northgard is now covered with eternal snow. Survive the neverending winter and battle your enemies while the ocean slowly freezes and becomes non-navigable under the polar winds.
Everything is spookier now. Your scarecrow won't suffice to keep the nasty spiders away!
Exit the current game to change this option.
A gentle environment, few hostile beasts, an easily satisfied population and feeble rivals.
A mild environment, some hostile beasts, a reasonable population and capable rivals.
An inhospitable environment, numerous hostile beasts, an insatiate population and powerful rivals.
An unbearable environment, hostile beasts everywhere, an eternally dissatisfied population and devilish rivals.
You cannot change team placement due to the following settings :
Team members spawn next to each other.
Team members are separated and split across the map.
Not available in Free Team mode.
Placement is fully randomized and ignores teams.
Available in Free Team mode only.
Are you sure you want to choose the ::category:: path?

::name:: has unlocked a new military ability.
::ability::

You have unlocked a new military ability.
::ability::
Select a civilian unit to improve its tools.
Select a military unit to improve its weapons.
Select a relic to start forging it.
Select a mercenary raid upgrade to start forging it.
Are you sure you want to stop forging this improvement?
Are you sure you want to stop forging this relic?
This tool will be forged soon.
Click to start improving this tool.
This weapon will be forged soon.
Click to start improving this weapon.
This relic will be forged soon.
You can only forge 1 relic, or ::nbRelics:: relics with [AncestralInfluence].
[::not_counted_relic::] does not count in this battle.
Click to start forging this relic.
Click to start this mercenary raid upgrade.
You need to summon [OxHero] before equipping any [Artifact]
Click on an [Artifact] to equip it
[Artifact]s can be found in [AncientBattleground]s in Northgard. The more you fight, the more chance you have to discover new ones.
Next one has not spawned yet
Select a recipe to prepare a meal
You need to unlock [::tech_name::] to cook for your allies.
You need to select a recipe to start cooking.
You need to select a clan to serve the meal to.
You need to build at least one [Stove] to begin cooking.
You are already cooking a meal.
You don't have enough [Food] to cook this meal.
You don't have enough ingredients to cook this meal.
You need at least ::nb:: [Cook] to cook this meal.
Improve the bonuses of the meal to the next level.
Increase the duration of the meal by one extra month.
Your relation is at ::value::. Some factions shall bestow their favors upon one clan only.
You cannot have a [Rivalry] targeting an ally.
You need an active [Emissary] to establish a [Rivalry].
You are currently watching the enemy's lore.
No clan is eligible for this [Rivalry].
You need to find a neutral faction to start seeing its details.
This faction is already loyal to a clan.
You are at war with this faction.
Are you sure you want to declare war to this faction?
Are you sure you want to betray this faction?
Betraying this faction will allow you to attack it, but exterminating it will not yield any reward. Moreover, you will lose the [DwarfChampion]s' loyalty.
Betraying this faction will allow you to attack it, but exterminating it will not yield any reward. Moreover, you will lose the [GiantHero]'s loyalty.
Betraying this faction will allow you to attack it, but exterminating it will not yield any reward.
There is no winner for this event.
The construction of a [CeremonialBonfire] has begun!
You were the best contributor to the [CeremonialBonfire]! You earned free Knowledge!
Alas! You were not the best contributor to the [CeremonialBonfire].
The [MyrkalfarFaction]s demand their dues and the clans had better pay up or face retaliation.
The [MyrkalfarFaction]s are dissatisfied and will retaliate against: ::PlayerList::.
The [MyrkalfarFaction]s are satisfied with your contribution and will retaliate against these clans: ::PlayerList::.
The [KoboldFaction]s have started their ritual around the Idol!
The [GiantFaction]s have started a blood feud!
The [GiantFaction]s you sided with have emerged victorious!
The [GiantFaction]s you sided with have been defeated!
You have allowed the [DwarfFaction]s to regain their lustre. They just sent you ::res::.
You did not earn the [DwarfFaction]s' favors.
This zone can't be colonized at this time.
There is no building in this zone.
You can't use this relic, you aren't its creator.
There are no civilians in this zone.
There is no Military Camp in this zone.
There is no enemy building in this zone.
You can only cast [AncientSpirit] on an enemy coastal zone without other neutral [SpecterWarrior].
You can only cast [SharpEye] on an enemy territory once you have an upgraded [ScoutCamp].
You already have a [SpikeTrap] set in this zone.
A [SpikeTrap] is already active on this zone.
You can only cast [SpikeTrap] on allied or neutral territories, and free of any hostiles.
You need to discover this zone to cast [::ability_name::].
You need to improve this unit's tool to unlock [::ability_name::].
You cannot purify a zone with a [TownHall].
You can only purify a zone adjacent to your territory.
You must unlock those arrows in the hunting board.
You cannot change you arrows if your trackers are in combat.
[LynxBrown] needs to be in the same zone.
[LynxWhite] needs to be in the same zone.
Can't be used on enemy territory.
A lure is already affecting this zone.
There are already some [Deer]s in this zone.
Your [LynxHero] can summon protector beasts only near [LureSacred].
You have to hunt at least 1 mythical wave.
You can't place more lures. Destroy one of your active lures to place a new one.
Your [LynxHero] is already trying to place a lure.
You haven't captured any mythical animals' spirit yet.
A trap is already set in a zone.
[::ability_name::] cannot be used on an undiscovered zone.
There is already a fire in a [HealerCamp]
This unit is not a military unit
There are no animals in this zone.
Halvard and the Heidrun Clan have met their end.
The mercenary search party will arrive in ::value:: months.
Hvedrung will soon blow the Gjallarhorn. You should brace yourself!
This zone is uninhabitable due to toxic fumes, sullied water and disease-bearing insects.
The powerful Champion of Jötunnheim's workers, here to help you overthrow the lords who have inherited the land.
Seize the means of wool production!
The dreaded Judicator of Jötunnheim, supreme enforcer of the lords' inherited authority and defender of private property.
Choose a faction or assist in crushing the other.
Skrymir is the king of Jötunnheim and owner of the land. His people strongly believe this entitles them to the products of the sheep.
Fjolsvin leads the workers of Jötunnheim. This faction believes their hard work should prevail over inherited property in the distribution of goods.
Assign your villagers to become [Smith]s. Allows you to forge better tools and weapons. You can also forge the mighty Wurmslayer using [RimeSteel].
Only a Smith of the Bear Clan can forge the famed Wurmslayer.
Assign your villagers to become [Smith]s and forge the Wurmslayer.
Collect enough [RimeSteel] and you'll be able to start forging the Wurmslayer.
[::unit::] is gravely wounded and will return to fight the Hrímgandr after recovering.
Are you sure you want to destroy this building?
Are you sure you want to remove this [LureSacred]?
Congratulations! You have achieved a ::vname:: victory!
Congratulations! Your team has achieved a ::vname:: victory!
You have reached the time limit.
All the [GiantFaction]s camps have been eradicated.
You failed to stop the invasion.
You lost your Town Hall. Your clan is defeated...
Use the Escape menu to pause the game.
Quit game without saving your progress?
Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to concede the game?
Leaving the game now will end the session and disconnect all players!
Unlock all Blessings to achieve a Wisdom victory!
Choose the Knowledge that will replace ::tech::
You didn't receive the blessing of a [FountainFame] yet.
Another clan claimed the knowledge of [FountainFame].
This is a gift from [FountainFame] (does not count toward a Lore victory or Blessing unlock).
You need [FountainFame] to benefit from this Knowledge.
Choose which resource your merchants will sell to earn [Money]:
Choose which faction to trade with:
You can't trade with a clan you're at war with
You can't trade with the opposing [GiantFaction] faction!
They will not accept this resource.

You can't trade with this clan.
You can't trade the same resource twice with the same clan.
You can't use this trade route twice with this faction.
You can't trade with other factions without ::name::
You haven't met any other clans yet.
This mine is depleted. You can destroy it.
Increases [Villager]s' build and repair speed by ::percent::.
Increases [Mender]s' healing speed by ::percent:: and produce ::percent:: more [Lore].
[::id::]s produce ::percent:: more [Fame] and [Happy], and ::percent:: more [Money] with [GreatDeeds].
Increases [Healer]s' healing speed by ::percent::. They also produce ::percent:: more [Food].
Increases [::id::]s' attack range and power by ::percent::.
Increases forge speed of your [::id::]s by ::percent::.
[::id::] gain the [Purify] ability and have its attack power increased by ::percent::.
[::id::]s discover new zones and explore ruins ::percent:: faster. They also run all the time while scouting.
Increases [::id::]s' attack power by ::percent:: and [ProjectileResist] by ::percent_value1::.
Increases [::id::]s' attack range and power by ::percent::.
[::id::]s produce ::percent:: more [Happy] and [Ingredients]. [SquirrelHero] also produces ::percent:: more [Ingredients].
Your [::id::]s' gain the [LastStand] ability, and will reduce close enemies defense.
Your [Scout] needs a Scouting Camp to explore new zones.
Waiting for the Longship to return...
Word of your success as a leader has reached other clans, and you have gained a new ability.
Not enough space to increase your population. You must build more [House]s.
Not enough space to increase your population. You must build more buildings.
There are no wounded or sick units to heal within your territory.
You need more [Happy] to grow your population.
Choose an additional resource for your [Sailor]s to look for:
You need to assign [Sailor]s to launch a raid.
Your [Sailor]s will explore a new coastal zone while raiding.
You need to have active [Sailor]s to explore.
There is no zone left for your [Sailor]s to explore.
Mercenaries will attack a selected coastal zone and stay there if they emerge victorious.
Choose a coastal zone in which to deploy [Mercenary]s.
You have not discovered a coastal zone for deployment.
Earn [Prestige] with Great Trade Routes and work toward a Trade victory.
You don't have enough [Money]s to create a Great Trade Route.
Build a [Lighthouse] on this [::portKind::] to unlock Great Trade Routes.

Buy ::nb:: [Slave]s.
Price increases +::slave_cost::[Money] each time.
Price decreases -::decrease_cost::[Money] each month.
You don't have enough [Money] to buy [Slave]s.
You don't have enough space for new [Slave]s. The maximum thrall population depends on your clan size.
[Sailor]s don't produce resources. Great Trade Routes are suspended.
Can't be used during the Frozen Sea event.
Are you willing to quit the game?
You have left lobbies early too frequently. Leaving this lobby now will result in a ::penalty_time:: second wait before you can create or join another lobby.
Quitting now might disrupt other players' game and result in a penalty.
We currently have +::v::. One new villager will join your clan every ::time:: days.
This is your current clan size. You have enough [House]s for ::max:: people.
This is your current clan size. You have enough housing for ::max:: people.
Those are additional villagers waiting in your [TownHall] who will appear as soon as there is room for them. The reserve can hold a maximum of ::max:: people.

This is the current number of [Slave]s in your clan. You can have up to ::max:: [Slave]s. This number depends on your clan size. You can buy more [Slave]s from your [Harbor]. Make sure that [Slave]s never outnumber your Vikings, as they could rebel against you...
Your current Warband size. Build military camps to increase it.
Build more military camps to increase the size of your Warband!
You have befriended the [MyrkalfarFaction]s. They will attack your enemies more often when you are at war.
The Clan of the Snake cannot gain [Fame].
Your trade routes with neutral faction produce +::percent:: [Money].
Unlock trading routes with neutral factions at the [TradingPost].
You can't repair a building while under attack!
Winter: Your military units get ::percent:: attack power when fighting outside of your territory. Food production is reduced and Wood consumption is increased.
Summer: make sure to stock up on Food for the coming winter.
Stockpiling: hurry up! Your units get ::percent:: bonus production.
A new villager will join us in ::day_number:: days.
Your clan is unhappy, no one will want to join.
Your village is feasting! It will last for ::day_number:: days.
Your units are overworking! It will last for ::day_number:: days.
The [Purification] is ignited! It will last for ::day_number:: days.
Your clan's production is increased by ::percent:: in preparation for winter.
This effect lasts all year long if the [Sheep] is in a [Sheepfold].
Allows you to assign one more [::unit::], and all [::unit::]s in this zone gain a ::percent:: [::res::] production bonus.
Allows you to assign one more [::unit::], and all [::unit::]s in this zone gain a ::percent:: [::res::] production bonus.
Allows you to assign one more [::unit::], and all [::unit::]s in this zone gain a ::percent:: [::res::] production bonus. Also shorten Exploration's time by ::percent1::
To recruit [RatMaiden] you need at least ::number:: $icon(Wounded)wounded units.

When activated, newly trained [::unit::]s will automatically rally to your closest warchief.

Winter approaches, your clan is gathering more resources for the bitter cold to come.
Upgrades for your raids are available at the forge.
::player_name:: has given up their [Rivalry] against your clan.
::name:: has landed on the shores of Northgard!

The Ragnarok Update features a brand new map, unique events, new zones, neutral factions and monsters!
The update also includes a brand new Military Experience system, allowing you to unlock unique skills for your warchief and your clan!
Check out the new Permafrost map and the festival decorations!
Northgard: Uncharted Lands is now on Kickstarter!

The board game based on Northgard is now live on Kickstarter!
Northgard: Uncharted Lands is a card-driven 4X game (exploration, expansion, exploitation, extermination) including deck building mechanics. Discover and support the game now on Kickstarter!
Pre-order the Northgard Soundtrack on a Vinyl now! Only a couple of hundred copies still available...
Help us make Northgard a better experience for everyone by filling out our player satisfaction survey!

The Clan of the Lynx is out now!
Head over to Steam and take charge of the latest and fiercest clan to have stepped upon the shores of Northgard, the Clan of the Lynx!

The Clan of the Lynx is out now!
Head over to GOG and take charge of the latest and fiercest clan to have stepped upon the shores of Northgard, the Clan of the Lynx!

The Clan of the Lynx is out now!
Head over to Origin and take charge of the latest and fiercest clan to have stepped upon the shores of Northgard, the Clan of the Lynx!
Play as a randomly selected clan when the game will start.
Follow the original adventure of Northgard's six founding clans. Learn to master them, all while discovering Rig's epic saga and its unique creatures, situations and challenges.
Choose your clan and confront rivals in the harsh lands of Northgard. Select a setting, victory types and level of difficulty to match your playstyle.
Challenge other players from around the world. Team up with friends or advance your ranking against strangers.
Use any element of Northgard, download or create mods and build your own fully customized game maps.
Complete achievements, daily side goals and weekly challenges in order to collect precious silver bars.
Unlock unique skins and decorations using your hard-earned silver bars.
Custom townhall skins, unit skins and decorations will be visible for everyone in the game.
All players will be forced to use the default townhall and unit skin. Decorations are disabled.
Public games can be joined by everyone.
The game can only be joined by friends through invitations from your platform's friend system.
Prove your worth against the best players of Northgard and get to the top of the ladder.
Mods can greatly change the way you play Northgard. Play original maps, follow custom and sometimes unfair rules and try a new way to have fun.
The lobby name will be visible by everyone. Lobby names that are rude, offensive or go against the Community Guidelines can be reported and incur a penalty.
Tags helps other players find your game more easily.

Ranked game is competitive mode. Each time you complete a game, you will earn or lose points that influence your position in the ladder. The Ranked mode is divided into segments called seasons. After each season, the ladder is reset.
Season ::name:: is now over. Fight for your spot on the leaderboards now! ::gloryPoints:: have been reset. The new season is now open until the next major update.

Click the Build button to construct a building. Select any spot in the zone to place the building.
Click Build to construct another building. Select either a Woodcutter's Lodge to produce [Wood] or a Scout Camp to discover new zones.
Your building is ready! Click to select a [Villager]. Clicking twice will select all units with the same job in a given zone.
Select a unit and right-click on the Woodcutter's Lodge to turn your [Villager]s into [Woodcutter]s. You can right-click several times to issue multiple orders.
Select a unit and right-click on the Scout Camp to turn your [Villager]s into [Scout]s.
You need [Scout]s to explore Northgard. Build a Scout Camp and turn one of your [Villager]s into a [Scout].
You need [Woodcutter]s to produce [Wood]. Build a Woodcutter's Lodge and turn one of your [Villager]s into a Woodcutter.
Your [Scout]s will discover new zones. Please wait until your [Scout] has finished discovering a zone.
This new zone is defended by enemies! Build a $build(::building::) and turn one of your [Villager]s into a [::unit::].
Select your [::military_unit::] and right-click on the zone occupied by foes to attack them!
To expand your territory, you need to colonize the new zone using [Food]. Click on the zone and spend some [Food] to colonize it.
The colonized zones will allow you to construct new buildings. Make sure to store enough [Food] and [Wood] to survive Northgard's harsh winters.
[Happy] is of paramount importance. DO NOT let it fall below 0. It automatically earns you new villagers, doing so faster as it increases. Keep it as high as you possibly can.
Select Zone Actions then Build Menu to construct a building. Select any empty spot in the zone to place the building.
Select Zone Actions to construct another building. Select either a Woodcutter's Lodge to produce [Wood] or a Scout Camp to discover new zones.
Move to your Woodcutter's Lodge and use Assign to turn your [Villager]s into [Woodcutter]s.
Move to your Scout Camp and use Assign to turn your [Villager]s into [Scout]s.
This new zone is defended by enemies! Build a $build(::building::) in the Military Buildings section and turn one of your [Villager]s into a [::unit::].
Hold Armies button, send your [::military_unit::] to the zone occupied by foes to attack them!
To expand your territory, you need to colonize the new zone using [Food]. Move to the empty zone and colonize it.

Adjust Screen Margin to fit your display.

At Shiro Games we strive to ensure that our players can enjoy a safe and welcoming online experience in all of our games, and with that we have created this community conduct agreement to ensure that the multiplayer environment remains an enjoyable and friendly place for all involved.

By clicking "I accept" on this page, you acknowledge and agree that the following conduct is unacceptable within the Northgard multiplayer community and may result in further action being taken by the Northgard team: - Trolling - Leaving and reentering lobbies with the intent of disruption/trolling - Leaving ranked team games - Obscene language, abuse or hostility towards fellow players - Teaming with friends against another player/s in FFA - Wintrading - Impersonation of another user or Shiro Games staff member - Racist or offensive lobby names - Racist or offensive language in chat - Stalking or harassment of other players

You are solely responsible and liable for any and all activities conducted on your account, even if your account has been compromised through no fault of your own. (In this scenario, we encourage you to contact a Shiro Games employee immediately for further investigation)

Behavior that puts other players at risk, impacts their enjoyment of the game or makes them feel unwelcome has no place in the Northgard community. And depending on severity, examples of unacceptable conduct such as outlined above may result in disciplinary action from the team here at Shiro Games such as: - An initial formal warning - Temporary removal of the ability to use the messaging system in Northgard - Temporary restrictions to the use of online services

Repeat or severe offenses may result in: - Temporary bans scaling in length, potentially culminating in a permanent ban - Permanent removal of the Northgard messaging system - A permanent ban from the online services in Northgard
In order to maintain these rules and guidelines, we have in place a reporting system for players to alert us of any behaviour that specifically violates the terms of service as outlined above.

All reports received will be thoroughly investigated by the Shiro Games community team, and in cases where we find evidence of any unacceptable behaviour appropriate measures will be taken in response.
Clicking I accept constitutes acceptance of these terms and your agreement to be bound by them.
